remarks: Principle of induction, using explicit substitutions.  Constructive proof (from CZF).  See the comment of ~ bj-findis for explanations. From this version, it is easy to prove ~ findes .  (Contributed by BJ, 21-Nov-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: bj-findes $p |- ( ( [. (/) / x ]. ph /\ A. x e. _om ( ph -> [. suc x / x ]. ph ) ) -> A. x e. _om ph ) $.
